name: Coffee House LCD
description:
Coffee House - a simulation of the handheld game.

Use the select button to select the game type, and then press the start button to start the game. Move the waitress left and right using the left and right buttons. Serve coffee to the customers as they appear with the service button.

FEATURES:
- High scores via Game Center
- Coffee, customers, and waitresses
- Insane coffee drinking action
- Zoom option
